name: u is kil
description:
WARNING: This game contains loud noises! Please turn down your volume for your own safety.

this game was made with godot. you can find godot's license here: https://godotengine.org/license

welcome to the pleasant land of kil! here, u get to read inspirational quotes, see the most beautiful graphics, listen to the most intense music and play with the most suitable controls! many people love this game, so come join in the fun!!!!! !  ! !!111 !1

(this is a joke, this game is actually some loud thing that randomly came out of michael's imagination)

enjoy!
